content.rendered:
Cyber Security Services Provider

OSIGOV, has been awarded a 3 year Cybersecurity Services Provider (CSSP) task order under the Defense Information Systems Agency (DISA) CSSP program. This program provides cybersecurity services for the DISA Enterprise, Combatant Commands (CCMDs), DOD agencies, and Cleared Defense Contractors (CDCs) that subscribe and align to DISA. Under this program our team will provide defensive operations by monitoring and providing situational awareness for identified portions of the Continental United States (CONUS) and inter-theater Enterprise Infrastructure backbone.
